name: RGB (Wretchedly)
description:
The pixels of an old, glitchy TV are coming alive and joining together to create new shapes and colors. Solve 12 puzzle levels with multiple solutions.

How to play:

Move and merge the pixels to form the right colors and shapes required to complete each level.

Controls: 

Click a pixel to select it.

Use WASD to move selected pixels.

Press Space to enter the selected pixel into join mode.

After entering join mode use WASD to chose an adjacent pixel to merge with.
